value.name: Reuters US Domestic News Summary
value.description: Following is a summary of current US domestic news briefs.   Anti-abortion protesters in New York win court ruling   A federal appeals court has thrown out its recent decision allowing New York's attorney general to block anti-abortion protesters from trying to keep women away from a reproductive health clinic in the New York City borough of Queens.
